Name: Stela of Pabes
Description: The rectangular stela has a rounded lunette with a winged sun disc above twelve columns of inscription. On the left of the decorated section, a mummiform Re-Harakhty is depicted on a small pedestal, holding a was-sceptre. Opposite him are three people standing in front of an offering table, two men and a woman. The bottom part of the stela has three horizontal lines of text. The colours of the stela are very well preserved.
